channel.description: Recent content in agile on sketches

item.title: What is Software Development?
item.description: This is a work-in-progress - and will be so for some time. It is picturing how one could think about Software Development - one of many possible ways. Tradeoffs are made - the main goal here was/is to communicate. Niklas: Something feels broken about all that code we have. Edmond: Maybe. But aren’t you making money? Niklas: We do. But doing anything new is hard, changing or fixing stuff is hard, everything feels so slow, so ineffective.
